titleStmt.title: The Danger of pride and ambition, with the excellency of humility & obedience shewing the reasons why the former ought to be avoided, and the later chosen and imbraced : being a profitable discourse, occasionally published upon the funeral solemnity of a late unfortunate person.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H.B. for P. Brooksby ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
